title: CoPilot.ORM
description: CoPilot is an object relational mapper (ORM). In its core it works like a micro ORM, but it has some neat and powerful features added on top of it.

packOptions.summary: Light weight object relational mapper (O/RM) for MS SQL
packOptions.releaseNotes: New version of CoPilot. This version has breaking changes and is not compatable with projects using version 1 - manual code migration required. This package can no longer be used by its own, you now need to install one of the CoPilot database providers (SqlServer, MySql or PostgreSql).
